headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://basemaps.cartocdn.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https://*.cartocdn.com https://*.openstreetmap.org; connect-src 'self' https://api.wheretheiss.at https://*.basemaps.cartocdn.com; worker-src 'self' blob:; font-src 'self' data:;
